formattedAddress: 13 Gansevoort St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 13 Gansevoort St, New York, NY 10014-1601, USA

originalText.text: Love Eberjey quality and customer service. I was ordering a large quantity for a family wedding. I worked with Olivia who was both knowledgeable and experienced. She advised on what to get for each individual in the bridal party and  where and if to monogram. Most notably when it came time to delivery, each box was wrapped beautifully labeled with persons name and seamless. Additionally she went above and beyond to confirm to track the packages and make sure everything went well. She remembered the date of the bridal shower and reached out with good wishes. Literally incredible experience. Thank you Olivia and the Eberjey team.

originalText.text: I've always loved Eberjey. The craftsmanship and superior quality always have me coming back for more. This particular location is wonderful. The manager, Caroline and the assistant manager, Brianna deserve a serious shout out. Wow, what incredible customer service they provided me with. They did everything to make me, the customer, happy and I truly appreciate it. I will definitely be supporting my local businesses and shop here as I suggest everyone should. You won't regret it. Thank you Brianna and Caroline. You lovely ladies are amazing!!!!!❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

originalText.text:
I love eberjey's products - it's the best pijiamas I've ever owned. Nonetheless I had a poor experience at the store:
- significant inventory was out of stock and had to compromise on what to buy, with some items outright not available
- the shop assistant wasn't on top of what was available and what wasn't, trying to find items my size almost felt like a scavanger hunt ('how about this colour? How about this other colour?')
- when I arrived home I realised the items I bought / were packed were not the ones I confirmed with the shop assistant (one extra set, one set in the wrong size)
- they asked for my details to send an electronic receipt which I never received

The store experience does not align with the brand proposition.

originalText.text: Adorable shop with top notch customer service. Ladies here really go above and beyond to make sure you love your purchase, including sending items to their repair department in Miami to have the scratchy tags expertly removed from previously purchased pieces. Awesome communication, really helpful big big fan of this location and staff.

originalText.text: Best pijamas ever! However in the store they have not so many sizes! And I personally dont like that they do not have flexibility for mixing bottom and top parts
